text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— The day has come.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now then, trainers. Let me hear your answers. … Why have you come before me?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: … Alright, I'll go first. As I mentioned before, I will make you stronger, no doubt about it. My mission is to help you claim victories.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: I've prepared a three-year training plan that showcases everything I have to offer you at this time.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Fantastic. This plan looks impressive at a glance. I will examine it more closely later.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now, who's next ——

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: That'd be me. …You're a horsegirl surrounded by incredibly high expectations, which can indeed be quite intimidating.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: However, I'm determined to meet those expectations, leading you to certain success. That's why I'm here!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: I've documented a race-winning strategy based on my analysis of your performances. Please take a look!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Wow, this looks impressive as well. I will review it later.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now finally… Trainer, let's hear your answer.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: The other day, you mentioned you wanted to see more of my running. In other words, you have hopes for my future.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: So show me, right here and now. What does the future you envision look like? What is it that you long to witness?
To respond to Symboli Rudolf's question, I showed her the photo I took the other day.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Is this… a picture of me? From when I introduced Maruzensky to Grass Wonder…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: This is… your way of presenting your answer?
choice_data_list: This is the future I want to see.
This is the future I want to see.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— I see. So that's what you mean…
Afterwards, Symboli Rudolf took her time to thoroughly review the presented plan and documents.
Until ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, even though you put in the effort to prepare all of this, I can't accept your offers.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: …… I understand. That's very unfortunate.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: We'll leave the rest to you. …Please take good care of her and ensure she reaches her full potential.
With a faint sense of reluctance, the two trainers departed.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: They were truly exceptional trainers… Any horsegirl working with them would surely have a wonderful experience.
choice_data_list: So why did you choose me…?
So why did you choose me…?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Why did I choose you? …. The answer is obvious.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: You tried to see things from the same perspective as me. And… that means more to me than I realized.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: My goal has always been to create a world where every horsegirl can be happy. To achieve that, I've given it my all until now.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But… yes. Deep down, I thought it might be an overly idealistic dream.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Yet here you are! I did feel that we got along nicely, but I never expected you'd share the same vision for the future as I do!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— I was happy, very happy.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Having someone who shares the same aspirations warms my heart… more than I ever expected.
choice_data_list: I feel honored to be chosen.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Oh, is that how you see it? Hahahah! You're truly humble!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— Well then. Let us reaffirm our commitment.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I am Symboli Rudolf. I stand here with the hope of creating an ideal world where every horsegirl can live happily.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But merely talking about dreams won't capture anyone's attention. Not without the appropriate recognition and achievements.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That is why I aim for the pinnacle, a throne worthy of a leader who can guide others.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I've been occupied with school activities as student council president for a while, but now the time has come.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Trainer, would you consider partnering with me?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Great, that's the answer I've been waiting for! … Then the glorious tale of Symboli Rudolf starts here.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Together with you…
A short time later…
Symboli Rudolf was already making her debut ——

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —— Thank you, everyone, for your support!
(Waaaahhhh…!!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Symboli Rudolf! Remarkable! Undeniably exceptional! Undoubtedly of the highest tier!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: We can't take our eyes off the magnificent future she's weaving!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …… Did you hear that?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heheh, Trainer, we both have quite the responsibility ahead, don't we?
The girl standing there smiling had greatly impressed many in her maiden race.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I…… Incredible……

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So she's… Symboli Rudolf……!!
